Contentious material about living persons that is unsourced or poorly sourced **must be removed immediately**, especially if potentially libelous or harmful. *Find sources:* "Min Lee" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(April 2011)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Lee Huei Min** (also known as **Min Lee**; born 1982 or 1983) is a Singaporean classical [violinist](/wiki/Violin). She has been dubbed as "Singapore's poster girl of classical music". ## Career Lee started playing violin at the age of two, and gave her first public performance at five at the [Victoria Concert Hall](/wiki/Victoria_Concert_Hall). She went to the United States at the age of nine to study music at the [University of Michigan](/wiki/University_of_Michigan) and later at [Oberlin College](/wiki/Oberlin_College)'s [Conservatory of Music](/wiki/Conservatory_of_Music). At the age of 14, Min she was accepted to the Masters program at [Yale University](/wiki/Yale_University). She was tutored by the late, eminent violinist [Erick Friedman](/wiki/Erick_Friedman). Erick himself was a protégé of [Jascha Heifetz](/wiki/Jascha_Heifetz) and [Nathan Milstein](/wiki/Nathan_Milstein). Lee has performed with renowned orchestras including Prague Chamber Orchestra, [Singapore Symphony Orchestra](/wiki/Singapore_Symphony_Orchestra), [Royal Philharmonic Orchestra](/wiki/Royal_Philharmonic_Orchestra), [Vienna Chamber Orchestra](/wiki/Vienna_Chamber_Orchestra), [Academy of St Martin in the Fields](/wiki/Academy_of_St_Martin_in_the_Fields), [Tchaikovsky Symphony Orchestra](/wiki/Tchaikovsky_Symphony_Orchestra) and [Russian National Orchestra](/wiki/Russian_National_Orchestra). She recorded an album *Debut* with the [Royal Philharmonic Orchestra](/wiki/Royal_Philharmonic_Orchestra). She was given the Singapore Youth Award in 2004. In April 2011 she became brand ambassador for [Finnair](/wiki/Finnair) in Singapore. She is the Program Director of the Wolfgang Violin Studio. ## Personal life She has three sisters Lee Huei Tjin, Lee Huey Yuan and Lee Huei Sheen. She is married to Loh Lik Peng and has a son Conor Loh and a daughter Cassie Loh. - Min Lee - Official homepage - Wolfgang Violin Studio - About Us This article about a Singaporean musician is a stub.
